description: This table stores history information about encounters linked to or unlinked from research enrollments.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the enrollment record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_PRL_CSN
columns.description: History information of study protocols linked to the encounter's contact serial numbers (CSN).

columns.name: HX_LNK_UNIQ_DAY_NUM
columns.description: History information of the timeline day linked to this encounter. This value corresponds to the value in ENROLL_TIMELINE.UNIQ_DAY_NUM.

columns.name: HX_TPL_CSN
columns.description: History information of the treatment plan contact serial number (CSN) linked to the encounter.

columns.name: HX_TREATMENTDAY_CSN
columns.description: History information of the treatment day contact serial number (CSN) linked to the encounter.

columns.name: HX_WHO_LINK_ENC_ID
columns.description: History information of the user who linked or unlinked an encounter to a study.

columns.name: HX_WHEN_LINK_ENC_DTTM
columns.description: History information of UTC formatted instant when user links or unlinks an encounter to a study.

columns.name: HX_LINKENC_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
History information of what action the user takes on encounter-study linkage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Linked


Unlinked

columns.name: HX_LINKED_ENC_CSN
columns.description: History information of contact serial numbers (CSN) of encounters linked to the study.

columns.name: HX_TREATMENT_DAY_LINE
columns.description: History information of the line number of the treatment day in the treatment plan that this encounter is linked to.
